title: Norton 360 21.4.0.13 + Trial Reset
description:
Norton 360 21.4.0.13 + Trial Reset


Norton 360 brings together proactive threat protection, automatic backup, and computer tune-up tools in one comprehensive solution that helps keep you safe from threats, guards your files against loss, and helps your computer run its best.
Our five patented layers of protection quickly and accurately detect and eliminate almost any threat, so you can do what you want online, knowing youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re protected. The ultra-fast network defense layer stops threats before they reach your PC. Norton 360 also blocks unsafe websites and scans your Facebook News Feed for threats, letting you surf, shop, socialize, and share online, without downloading threats or having your passwords and identity stolen.

Advanced reputation and behavior antivirus detection technology stays ahead of all types of viruses, even new ones that havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t been invented yet. And a powerful threat-removal layer gets rid of hard-to-remove infections.

Norton 360 automatically backs up your photos, music, and other important files when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not using your PC, so it wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get in your way. And you can restore your files with a few clicks. Plus, PC Tuneup fixes PC problems to help keep your computer running fast and trouble-free.

Norton automatically sends you important product and feature updates throughout the year, so youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll always have the most up-to-date product version.

Cloud-based Norton Management lets you fix, update, renew, and install Norton 360 on additional PCs over the Internet. You can also bring together in one place your other Norton products for your Mac computer, smartphone, and tablet. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have straightforward solutions that work together protecting you on your various devices.
